articles.author: Jennifer Hughes, Claire Jones
articles.title: US inflation rises to 2.5%, according to Fed's target index - Financial Times
articles.description: PCE figures for February were in line with economists’ expectations but remain above central bank’s target
articles.content: US inflation rose slightly to 2.5 per cent in February, according to the metric that the Federal Reserve uses for its target, highlighting the bumpy road ahead for central bankers as they decide when… [+3190 chars]
